name: Arena of Shaelo
description: Arena of Shaelo is a pixelated co-op card game set in the world of Shaelo. Once you begrudgingly take a step into the arena, it soon dawns on you that it is only through the power of teamwork that both you and your teammate might make it out alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: (OpenGL ES 2.0) Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: (OpenGL ES 2.0) Storage: 200 MB available space
